title: In Sweden, 'snus' is defended against all odds
subhed: In the Scandinavian country, the use of nicotine pouches has surged, yet any form of regulation remains off the table. Lobbyists have presented snus as a risk-free alternative to cigarettes, while political leaders defend it as an integral part of the Swedish lifestyle.
